title: Cultural Heritage and Identity
des: The role of Indigenous women in preserving languages, rituals, and oral traditions.
longDes: This course explores how Indigenous women safeguard cultural heritage while navigating modern challenges. Learners will understand how identity, tradition, and storytelling shape empowerment, leadership, and advocacy for Indigenous rights.
whatYouLearn: Anyone interested in Indigenous culture and gender equity
